GetItems.name: GetItems
GetItems.label: Get items

expect.help: Enter tag name if you want to filter items by tag. Use `_untagged_ ` to return only untagged items.
expect.name: tag
expect.label: Tag

expect.help: Enter domain name if you want to filter items by domain. E.g. google.com
expect.name: domain
expect.label: Domain

expect.help:
Simple - return basic information about each item, including title, url, status, and mores 
 Complete - return all data about each item, including tags, images, authors, videos, and more
expect.name: detailType
expect.label: Detail Type

GetItems.description: Returns items that match the given filter.
